hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | { read file_path; ext="${file_path##*.}"; case "$ext" in js|ts|jsx|tsx|json) npx prettier --write "$file_path" 2>/dev/null ;; erb) if [[ "$file_path" == *.html.erb ]]; then npx prettier --write "$file_path" 2>/dev/null; fi ;; rb|rake) bundle exec rubocop -a "$file_path" 2>/dev/null ;; esac; }
